name: the apocalypse, but make it fashion. ✨

content.html: Being a grown up is hard, and I don’t think we hear enough that the true mark of success is whether or not we improve the lives of the people around us. If you’re doing your best to make the world a safe place for others, you’re doing good work. Keep it up, I appreciate you!
content.value:
Being a grown up is hard, and I don’t think we hear enough that the true mark of success is whether or not we improve the lives of the people around us.

If you’re doing your best to make the world a safe place for others, you’re doing good work.

Keep it up, I appreciate you!
